name: Path Traversal File Server
description: A file server with a path traversal vulnerability. Learn to exploit directory traversal flaws to access sensitive files outside the intended directory.

metadata.author: DVC Security Team
learning_objectives: Learn to manipulate file paths to access restricted files
Recognize the importance of input validation for file operations
hints: The application allows you to download files from a specific directory
Try using special characters like ../ to navigate the file system
The flag is stored in a file at the root of the filesystem
URL encode your payload if special characters don't work
solution_steps: Access the file server homepage to see available files
Notice the download functionality uses a 'file' parameter
Try accessing /download?file=../flag.txt to go up one directory
Continue adding ../ sequences until you reach the root directory
The flag is in /flag.txt, so use: /download?file=../../../flag.txt
